short_summary: Perform annual dental sterilization audits in 10 institutions
description: The following is a summary of the statement of work for this requirement.
full_summary:
**Dental Sterilization Audits**
===============

**Reference Number**
-----------------

*   cb-4703-17924524

**Amendment Number**
-----------------

*   1

**Publication Date**
-----------------

*   April 11, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

*   May 5, 2023 (14:00:00)

**Procurement Overview**
----------------------

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites qualified contractors to bid on the dental sterilization audit program. The program involves annual audits of 10 institutions within the Ontario Region to assess compliance with on-site dental sterilization.

**Statement of Work**
--------------------

The contractor will be responsible for conducting annual dental sterilization audits. Deliverables include:

*   A written report noting compliance and deficiencies, to be submitted within 30 days of the audit
*   Immediate reporting of deficiencies or practices likely to harm a patient if not corrected

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

*   Conduct annual dental sterilization audits for 10 Ontario Region institutions
*   Provide a report of compliance and deficiencies
*   Immediately report any deficiencies or practices likely to harm a patient

**Tender Documents**
-----------------

The tender documents can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4703/npp-en-dental-sterilization-audits.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4703/npp-en-dental-sterilization-audits.pdf)
